remarks.format: ## Remarks 包含导致 事件的 。 contains the that caused the event. 此类提供用于检索异常的 方法。This class provides the method to retrieve the exception. ## Examples 下面的示例创建 的新实例，并使用 初始化该实例。The following example creates a new instance of and initializes it with an . 然后，该示例调用 来检索 并显示错误消息。Then the example calls to retrieve the and display the error message. 没有与此代码关联的窗体。There is no form associated with this code. [!code-cpp[Classic ErrorEventArgs Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic ErrorEventArgs Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic ErrorEventArgs Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic ErrorEventArgs Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic ErrorEventArgs Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic ErrorEventArgs Example/VB/source.vb#1)] 下面的示例演示如何创建 FileSystemWatcher 来监视磁盘驱动器上发生的文件更改（创建、删除、重命名、更改）。The following example shows how to create a FileSystemWatcher to monitor file changes (creates, deletes, renames, changes) occurring on a disk drive. 该示例还演示如何正确接收错误通知。The example also shows how to properly receive error notifications.
